long_description: A streamlined, easily accessible bag that holds energy bars, money, phone or keys, the Deuter Energy Frame Bag attaches to the front top tube so you can reach it easily while you ride. Deuter Energy Frame Bag attaches with rip-and-stick straps. Polyurethane-coated nylon is lightweight, tough and weather-resistant. Reflective highlights increase visibility in dim light.
short_description: A streamlined, easily accessible bag that holds energy bars, money, phone or keys, the Deuter Energy Frame Bag attaches to the front top tube so you can reach it easily while you ride.
